modifier.bxp2.bx.description: Increase up to 15% additional damage based on the BX products in your inventory
modifier.bxp2.bx1.description: Increase up to 82.5% additional damage based on the BX products in your inventory
modifier.bxp2.coldness.description: Cause additional 25% damage to full-health targets
modifier.bxp2.bx2.description: Increase up to 270% additional damage based on the BX products in your inventory
modifier.bxp2.giant_killer.flavor: Don't be afraid of those big guys!
modifier.bxp2.giant_killer.description: Deal additional damage to targets with higher health than you, unlimited
modifier.bxp2.kill_all.description: Deal additional damage to the target at three times its maximum health
modifier.bxp2.sorrow.description: Attacks have a chance to incapacitate targets
modifier.bxp2.eternal.description: Your items cannot break from durability loss
modifier.bxp2.chronodragon_fury.descript: Gradually increases damage while held. Tier affects max bonus
bxp2.message.tib_pass: Time in bottle cant use in this machine
bxp2.screen.difficulty.title: DaXuan Modpack Difficulty Selection
bxp2.screen.difficultyeasy_1: May occasionally apply vulnerability to targets in combat
bxp2.screen.difficultyeasy_4: Mobs don't strengthen with game days
bxp2.screen.difficultyeasy_7: Some recipes require fewer materials or offer simplified crafting
bxp2.screen.difficultyeasy_8: Mobs won't have modpack balance adjustments
bxp2.screen.difficultyeasy_9: Cannot obtain higher difficulty exclusive items
bxp2.screen.difficultynormal_4: Mobs strengthen by 1% each game day
bxp2.screen.difficultynormal_6: Time Bottle cannot be used for catalyst-required recipes
bxp2.screen.difficultynormal_8: Includes modpack balance adjustments for mobs
bxp2.screen.difficultynormal_9: Cannot obtain higher difficulty exclusive items
bxp2.screen.difficultyhard_1: Can receive vulnerability, severe wounds etc. when hit by mobs
bxp2.screen.difficultyhard_2: Death only retains accessory bar, hotbar, armor slots and held items
bxp2.screen.difficultyhard_4: Mobs strengthen by 4% each game day
bxp2.screen.difficultyhard_6: Time Bottle cannot be used for catalyst-required recipes
bxp2.screen.difficultyhard_7: Some materials require more resources and complex crafting
bxp2.screen.difficultyhard_8: Modpack mob balance buffs increased by 50%, nerfs decreased by 50%
bxp2.message.no_permission: You don't have permission to perform this action!
bxp2.message.difficulty_change: Game difficulty changed successfully. Please restart the game completely to ensure all modifications take effect. Current difficulty:
bxp2.message.welcome1: Welcome to DaXuan Modpack 2! Current modpack version:
bxp2.message.welcome3: You can adjust the difficulty anytime via config files or the modpack difficulty tool!
